Uses of Package
edu.rit.m2mp.packet

Packages that use edu.rit.m2mp.packet
edu.rit.m2mp.packet Package edu.rit.m2mp.packet contains classes that encapsulate the packets in the Many-to-Many Protocol (M2MP). 
 

Classes in edu.rit.m2mp.packet used by edu.rit.m2mp.packet
OutOfPacketsException
          Class OutOfPacketsException is an IOException thrown to indicate that an incoming or outgoing packet cannot be allocated because all byte buffers are in use.
Packet
          Class Packet is the abstract superclass for a packet in the Many-to-Many Protocol (M2MP).
